column4: On average, how long should it take to fetch packages while upgrading from dapper to edghy ( on a cable connection)??
today? Probably more than a hour.  Heavy load on the servers right now.
probably closer to a few hours for a standard upgrade.      (I got in early and all upgraded ;-)
sudo apt-get -dy dist-upgrade  (and come back in a few hours and do:    sudo apt-get dist-upgrade)
